scripts.build_server_script: cd o2server && mvn clean && mvn install
scripts.build_server_deploy: cd o2server && mvn clean && mvn deploy
scripts.build_parallel: npm run build_server && npm run build_web && npm run build_api
scripts.typeInfor: echo Build Success! Your server is build success: target/o2server/
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:win: npm run clear && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:win  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:linux: npm run clear  && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:linux  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:aix: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:aix  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:arm: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:arm  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:macosx64: npm run clear  && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:macosx64  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:macosarm: npm run clear  && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:macosarm  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:mips: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:mips  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:rpi: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:rpi && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build:sw: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:sw && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci: npm run clear && npm run preperation && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:win: npm run clear && npm run preperation:win && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:win  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:linux: npm run clear && npm run preperation:linux && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:linux  && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:aix: npm run clear && npm run preperation:aix && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:aix && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:arm: npm run clear && npm run preperation:arm && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:arm && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:macosx64: npm run clear && npm run preperation:macosx64 && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:macosx64 && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:macosarm: npm run clear && npm run preperation:macosarm && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:macosarm && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:mips: npm run clear && npm run preperation:mips && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:mips && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:rpi: npm run clear && npm run preperation:rpi && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:rpi && npm run typeInfor
scripts.build_ci:sw: npm run clear && npm run preperation:sw && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:sw && npm run typeInfor
